XjXQqG6UjCpdQPCW.name: Hurler's Stance
XjXQqG6UjCpdQPCW.description:
Requirement: Must have a hand free.

While you remain in this stance and meet the requirement, you can throw items such as alchemist’s fire, tanglefoot bags, and acid flasks as a bonus action after you take the Attack action.
